metadataAttributes.Title: Patient Safety Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Become a Leader in Patient Safety. Master the strategies and tools to implement effective patient safety and quality initiatives.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Patient Care, Patient Safety, Comprehensive Unit-Based Safety Program (Cusp) Toolkit, Quality Improvement, Systems Thinking, Communication, Healthcare Leadership, Organizational Culture, Project Management, Design Thinking, Change Management, Project Planning,
metadataAttributes.Instructors: Melinda Sawyer ,Eileen Kasda ,Bob Hody ,Lisa H. Lubomski, PhD ,David Thompson DNSc, MS, RN ,Matt Austin ,David Schwartz ,
